docs.title: Welcome to ECAnalyse
docs.text:
ECAnalyse is a flexible Python toolkit for manipulating and analysing various experiments which involve electrochemistry

  • 📊 Built for scientific data workflows
  • ⏱ Time-aware, with support for elapsed/absolute time
  • 🧪 Easy to extend with custom file formats

👋 New here? Start with Getting Started

🧠 Know Python? Check the API Reference

🤝 Want to contribute? See Developer Guide
